articles.author: Eric Garcia
articles.title: ‘Putin chose this war, he will pay’: Biden announces ‘major’ new sanctions on Russia over Ukraine invasion - The Independent
articles.description: ‘Every asset they have in America will be frozen’
articles.content:
President Joe Biden forcefully condemned Russias invasion of Ukraine on Thursday afternoon, and announced strong sanctions against Russian President Vladimir Putins regime.
